name: Toy Hero Blast
description:
Toy Hero is a perfect matching puzzle game with lovely characters, stunning graphic and unique gameplay.
Travel through magical kingdom, visiting wonderful places and meeting lovely toy friends! Sometimes the nasty bear is the troublemaker. Switch and match your way to beat it in this sweet puzzle adventure. Numerous boosters along the way help you too!

Features:
• Collect candy drops to advance along the candy track for special surprises!
• Tasty Candy graphics that will leave you hungry for more
• Unwrap delicious environments and sweetest gameplay in the wonderland
• Helpful magical boosters to help with challenging levels
• Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
• Hundreds of sweet levels in the Toy Kingdom - more added every month!
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!

Follow us to get news and updates:
facebook.com/toyherosaga
publishers: Shanghai Joy Mania Network Technology Co
